snippet: An outside law firm hired by the Postal Service warned the nine-member board that oversees the agency that they risked being removed from office if they proceeded with plans to end mail delivery on Saturdays.

headline.main: Legal Memo Advised Postal Service Against Ending Saturday Delivery
